body:
> this application is solely for gamepad input

For joystick connection events to be delivered on macOS (and Windows), the main thread message queue must be polled. Try calling `glfwPollEvents` at regular intervals instead of reinitializing the whole library.
`glfwPollEvents` is already being called in the update loop. I still have to re-initialize the library for the connected state of joysticks to change.

issue.body:
Gamepads are not detected if they are connected after the game has already started. This happened on Windows, Linux, and Mac.

This issue on GLFW looks like it may need to be updated to version 3.3 to fix the problem: https://github.com/glfw/glfw/issues/1218
